title: yohero
author: yohero
content: Hello , i found website https://ixexchanger.comi need to review it's works or noti see the live chat is working and they replying to me but need review about website

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.created_time: March 26, 2023, 12:08:10 AMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 04:59:53 PM by Charles-Tim
comments.body: I quote the OP in full in case...Quote from: yohero on March 25, 2023, 11:53:54 PMHello , i found website https://ixexchanger.comi need to review it's works or noti see the live chat is working and they replying to me but need review about websiteQuote from: yohero on March 25, 2023, 11:53:54 PMi see the live chat is working and they replying to me Immediately that you visit the site you saw an icon to chat with their customer care? That is a way to know a website is likely a scam or not. I further my investigation. The exchange domain was registered last year, 2022. Code:Domain:ixexchanger.comRegistrar:GoDaddy.com, LLCRegistered On:2022-06-30Expires On:2023-06-30Updated On:2022-09-12I chat with their customer representative, see the chat:     According to our chat, I want to know how old the exchange has been existing, the customer care wrote 2020. But the domain name was created just last year.Avoid, it is a scam site. Edit: You even knew the site was a scam before, according to you trust page. I will give you a neutral trust for that. Likely you are here to scam.
